title: DARON MALAKIAN, NINE INCH NAILS, THE ACACIA STRAIN & More Among Metal Injection's Top Tracks Of The Week
description: Plus 3Teeth, Biohazard, Amon Amarth, and more! The post DARON MALAKIAN, NINE INCH NAILS, THE ACACIA STRAIN & More Among Metal Injection's Top Tracks Of The Week appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 8 hours ago
excerpt: Plus 3Teeth, Biohazard, Amon Amarth, and more!
text: Top Tracks Of The Week DARON MALAKIAN, NINE INCH NAILS, THE ACACIA STRAIN & More Among Metal Injection's Top Tracks Of The Week Plus 3Teeth, Biohazard, Amon Amarth, and more! This week's top tracks include a new banger from our Artist Of The Month Daron Malakian and Scars On Broadway, the return of Nine Inch Nails, a totally abysmal jam from The Acacia Strain, and more! Check out the playlist on Spotify here and on Apple Music here. The new additions this week are: "You Destroy You" – Daron Malakian and Scars On Broadway "As Alive As You Need Me To Be" – Nine Inch Nails "A CALL BEYOND" – The Acacia Strain "Civil War" – 3TEETH "Blasphemy Made Fresh" – Cryptopsy, Billy Strings, Shadow of Intent, Stabbing, Undeath, Carcosa, Emasculator "Fuck the System" – Biohazard "We Rule the Waves" – Amon Amarth "Hallelujah" – Black Veil Brides "Eos" – Der Weg einer Freiheit Want More Metal? html:
Top Tracks Of The Week

DARON MALAKIAN, NINE INCH NAILS, THE ACACIA STRAIN & More Among Metal Injection's Top Tracks Of The Week

Plus 3Teeth, Biohazard, Amon Amarth, and more!

This week's top tracks include a new banger from our Artist Of The Month Daron Malakian and Scars On Broadway, the return of Nine Inch Nails, a totally abysmal jam from The Acacia Strain, and more! Check out the playlist on Spotify here and on Apple Music here. The new additions this week are:

  1. "You Destroy You" – Daron Malakian and Scars On Broadway
  2. "As Alive As You Need Me To Be" – Nine Inch Nails
  3. "A CALL BEYOND" – The Acacia Strain
  4. "Civil War" – 3TEETH
  5. "Blasphemy Made Fresh" – Cryptopsy, Billy Strings, Shadow of Intent, Stabbing, Undeath, Carcosa, Emasculator
  6. "Fuck the System" – Biohazard
  7. "We Rule the Waves" – Amon Amarth
  8. "Hallelujah" – Black Veil Brides
  9. "Eos" – Der Weg einer Freiheit
